title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-5.10 - Surface drainage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-5.10 - Surface drainage

State Regulations

An agricultural fairground owner shall ensure that an agricultural fairground is maintained so that adequate surface drainage is provided during its operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
7-5.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
